content.p: This page sets out the role of Internal and External examiners for research degree programmes, including policy, criteria and appointment requirements. Its content is primarily directed at staff across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. Please be aware that during academic year 2020/21, the University introduced additional guidance in response to the Covid-19 pandemic. This page was previously affected by these arrangements and has been documented accordingly. Further details can be found in the "Additional guidance in 2020/21 due to Covid-19" section below.
